00020 #ifndef OUTPUT_FILE
00021 #define OUTPUT_FILE

00024 
00025 #include <fstream>

00027 using namespace std;
00028 
00032 class OutputFile : public ofstream
00033 {
00034         public:
00038                 OutputFile() : filename(""),force(false),mode(ios_base::trunc) {};
00045                 OutputFile(string filename,bool force,ios_base::openmode mode) : filename(filename),force(force),mode(mode) {};
00049                 virtual ~OutputFile() {};
00056                 virtual void set(string filename,bool force,ios_base::openmode mode) { this->filename = filename; this->force = force; this->mode = mode; };
00060                 virtual void create() throw(NLXError);
00061 
00062         private:
00063 
00064                 string                                          filename;
00065                 bool                                                    force;
00066                 ios_base::openmode              mode;
00067 };
